column2: image=[[File:The Hobbit - The Desolation of Smaug - Feren.PNG
caption="Feren" from ''[[The Hobbit: The Desolation of Smaug]]''
Elf]] of the [[Woodland Realm]] who appears in the [[The Hobbit (film series)
column3: ''Hobbit'' film series]]. He was played by [[Simon London]]. When it is discovered that [[Thorin and Company]] have escaped from their prison cells via wine barrels, Feren blows a horn to alert the Elves guarding the gate that leads to the [[River Running]], also ordering them to close the gate so as to bring the [[Dwarves]] back into custody.

column1: Later, Feren is sent by [[Thranduil]] to where the [[Lake-town]] refugees are staying to summon [[Legolas]] back to [[Mirkwood]], and to also inform [[Tauriel]] that the elven-king has banished her from the realm. He also serves as one of Thranduil's chief lieutenants in the [[Battle of Five Armies]].
